55196d29-82f4-4981-bb99-7fcafc8e297f.description: Earners of the BigID Professional badge have successfully completed the BigID Professional course and have foundational multi-disciplinary understanding of the BigID platform. Badge recipients are familiar with BigID's value and core discovery, the user interface and main use cases, data scanning and analysis, strategy for platform deployment, and general administration and maintenance.
55196d29-82f4-4981-bb99-7fcafc8e297f.name: BigID Professional Course

a62d07d1-5fa2-46c8-a39d-ad67f5572791.description: Earners of the BigID Associate BizUser badge have successfully completed the BigID Associate BizUser course and have foundational knowledge of how to derive value from BigID. Badge recipients are familiar with core BigID use cases, screens and apps, and can use BigID to help with actionable intelligence for enterprise data in the privacy, protection and perspective domains.
a62d07d1-5fa2-46c8-a39d-ad67f5572791.name: BigID Associate BizUser Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a BigID Associate BizUser course

0649f11e-3723-48f6-b390-d1dfa2dac4d1.description: Earners of the Certified BigID Associate BizUser certification have credible skills and core understanding of how to derive value from BigID. Badge recipients have the competency to implement core BigID use cases, use screens and apps, and use BigID to help with actionable intelligence for enterprise data in the privacy, protection and perspective domains.
0649f11e-3723-48f6-b390-d1dfa2dac4d1.name: Certified BigID Associate BizUser

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a Certified BigID Associate BizUser certification exam

4d389718-25d0-409b-a6cd-1af37f17e9be.description: Earners of the BigID Expert badge have successfully completed the BigID Expert course and have advanced multi-disciplinary understanding of key usage and technical BigID topics. Badge recipients have hands-on experience with installation and setup of the system, deep familiarity with the BigID user interface and advanced use cases, expertise with data scanning and analysis tasks, and practical integration, administration and troubleshooting knowledge.
4d389718-25d0-409b-a6cd-1af37f17e9be.name: BigID Expert Course

5ada3d5a-9127-4543-9c4e-d1b87df1c286.description: Earners of the BigID Associate Operator badge have successfully completed the BigID Associate Operator course and have essential knowledge and practical experience with scanning data in BigID. Badge recipients are familiar with BigID's core discovery foundation, BigID data sources, classifiers, correlation sets and scans.
5ada3d5a-9127-4543-9c4e-d1b87df1c286.name: BigID Associate Operator Course

f6357a7b-58f5-412b-9570-8812251ecb86.description: Earners of the BigID Associate Admin badge have successfully completed the BigID Associate Admin course and are familiar with the platform deployment process and administrative post-installation tasks. Badge recipients know core BigID platform concepts, the installation and upgrade process and considerations, basic BigID API usage, and ongoing platform maintenance.
f6357a7b-58f5-412b-9570-8812251ecb86.name: BigID Associate Admin Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a BigID Associate Admin Course

9a8accd3-65b9-4f5b-a3d8-a37579a98478.description: Get to know BigID! Explore data discovery, privacy, security, and governance fundamentals and discover BigID's core business capabilities through demos and theory.
9a8accd3-65b9-4f5b-a3d8-a37579a98478.name: BigID BizUser Essentials Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a BigID BizUser Essentials course

fab84548-5945-42b2-99ad-8dfb87be3d1b.description: Earners of the Certified BigID Associate Operator certification have credible skills and core understanding of scanning data in BigID. Badge recipients have competency in BigID's core discovery foundation, creating and managing BigID data sources, classifiers, correlation sets and scans.
fab84548-5945-42b2-99ad-8dfb87be3d1b.name: Certified BigID Associate Operator

60607bad-bb81-4ff0-870c-c1a9e28ae219.description: Earners of the Certified BigID Associate Admin certification have credible skills and core understanding of the platform deployment process and administrative post-installation tasks. Badge recipients have competency in core BigID platform concepts, the installation and upgrade process and considerations, basic BigID API usage, and ongoing platform maintenance.
60607bad-bb81-4ff0-870c-c1a9e28ae219.name: Certified BigID Associate Admin

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a Certified BigID Associate Admin certification exam

8e8a44f9-a68c-40c8-95ba-cc3b4d140458.description: Earners of the Certified BigID Associate Specialist certification have credible skills to plan a BigID project and use the platform. They are competent in communicating BigID's value proposition, planning a deployment, performing core administrative and maintenance tasks, and using the platform to drive data privacy, security, compliance and governance use cases.
8e8a44f9-a68c-40c8-95ba-cc3b4d140458.name: Certified BigID Associate Specialist

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a Certified BigID Associate Specialist certification exam

5861e141-d637-4462-93a4-eac24d7f8530.description: Earners of the Certified BigID Master Operator certification have credible skills and advanced understanding of scanning data in BigID. Badge recipients have competency and practical experience with advanced BigID data scan design and refinement, defining complex data sources and correlation sets, building custom classifiers, and integrating BigID with external systems through an API.
5861e141-d637-4462-93a4-eac24d7f8530.name: Certified BigID Master Operator

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a Certified BigID Master Operator certification exam

c65689ac-e08c-421d-b017-e08cacbbb9a1.description: Earners of the Certified BigID Master Admin certification have credible skills and deeper practical experience with platform installation, upgrade and maintenance. Badge recipients have competency in platform installation and updates, advanced service configuration, setting up user access and role-based permissions, deeper understanding of maintenance strategy, the BigID API, and customizing various user interface elements and BI tool integrations.
c65689ac-e08c-421d-b017-e08cacbbb9a1.name: Certified BigID Master Admin

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a Certified BigID Master Admin certification exam

61a1bbf4-e020-4f64-bd39-4097d2896753.description: Earners of the BigID Master Operator badge have successfully completed the BigID Master Operator course and have advanced knowledge and deeper practical experience with scanning data in BigID. Badge recipients are familiar with advanced BigID data scan design and refinement, defining complex data sources and correlation sets, building custom classifiers, and integrating BigID with external systems through an API.
61a1bbf4-e020-4f64-bd39-4097d2896753.name: BigID Master Operator Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a BigID Master Operator course

2fd1e6dc-3335-4edc-9e33-2f81dfe5a5a9.description: Earners of the BigID Master Admin badge have successfully completed the BigID Master Admin course and have advanced knowledge and deeper practical experience with platform installation, upgrade and maintenance. Badge recipients can install and upgrade BigID, perform advanced service configuration, set up user access and role-based permissions, build deeper understanding of maintenance strategy, use the BigID API, and customize various user interface elements and BI tool integrations.
2fd1e6dc-3335-4edc-9e33-2f81dfe5a5a9.name: BigID Master Admin Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a BigID Master Admin course

e6f67438-fbb8-4972-abd9-186e6b4fc8a4.description: Earners of the Certified BigID Master Specialist certification have demonstrated skills to install, use and operate BigID independently. e32744be-a34c-4689-915f-e01aa4853002.description: Goes deeper into BigID's data privacy app portfolio, which includes the RoPA app, the PIA app and the Data Deletion app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
e32744be-a34c-4689-915f-e01aa4853002.name: BigID Master Privacy BizUser Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a Master Privacy BizUser course

5b8d0932-cd88-4ae1-ab7b-5da9722661ae.description: Earners of this certification have associate-level proficiency in overseeing a BigID project and directing the project team from planning to production. The certification exam focuses on theoretical and practical knowledge in a variety of BigID project domains, including general platform value, architecture and deployment approaches, and managing discovery and scanning.
5b8d0932-cd88-4ae1-ab7b-5da9722661ae.name: Certified BigID Associate Project Manager

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a Certified BigID Associate Project Manager certification exam

475c114b-1c25-4b4f-853e-102c4cb1bf71.description: Earners of the Certified BigID Master BizUser certification have credible skills and advanced understanding of the BigID value generation, use cases and business apps. Badge recipients have the competency to use BigID discovery foundation capabilities and apps to support more complex data compliance, governance and security scenarios.
475c114b-1c25-4b4f-853e-102c4cb1bf71.name: Certified BigID Master BizUser

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a Certified BigID Master BizUser certification exam

23597b7f-e14a-453f-800b-58e71c865540.description: This examination confirms high-level proficiency of how to build a privacy program, an understanding of the challenges and approaches to modern data privacy, privacy drivers for data governance, privacy by design, and current privacy regulations around the globe.
23597b7f-e14a-453f-800b-58e71c865540.name: Qualified Associate Data Privacy Pro

d54c611c-9661-4793-8aaa-d8f04a5abeec.description: Earners of the BigID Master BizUser badge have successfully completed the BigID Master BizUser course and have advanced knowledge of BigID value generation, use cases and business apps. Badge recipients are versed in how to use BigID discovery foundation capabilities and apps to support more complex data compliance, governance and security scenarios.
d54c611c-9661-4793-8aaa-d8f04a5abeec.name: BigID Master BizUser Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a BigID Master BizUser course

db57e4e2-728b-42e3-a78d-5ddfb3bb0844.description: This instructor-led lab introduces the basics on data scanning in BigID. Topics covered include the setup and management of data sources, a high-level coverage of data source credential management, setup and considerations of correlation sets, enabling classification, running basic scans using scan profiles, and the scan results details screen.
db57e4e2-728b-42e3-a78d-5ddfb3bb0844.name: BigID Data Scanning 1 Lab

7e793c1d-794a-4ff3-a461-aa363eb21470.description: This certification confirms master-level proficiency in BigID's data privacy app portfolio, which includes the Data Rights Fulfillment app, the RoPA app, the PIA app and the Data Deletion app. The certification exam focuses on theoretical and practical knowledge of BigID privacy apps, usage scenarios, and advanced privacy use cases.
7e793c1d-794a-4ff3-a461-aa363eb21470.name: Certified BigID Master Privacy BizUser

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a Certified BigID Master Privacy BizUser certification exam

97ce3fc9-b085-46fa-8ef9-911c29778e94.description: This is the first module in our privacy training program for professionals. It focuses on how to build a privacy program, and provides high-level introduction to challenges and approaches to modern data privacy with additional coverage of privacy drivers for data governance.
97ce3fc9-b085-46fa-8ef9-911c29778e94.name: BigID Professional Modern Data Privacy 1 Module

18516bb1-f465-480c-b84d-7fd5f71fe46b.description: This module focuses on managing data assets using different BigID features, including the management of policies, calculating risk, and using BigID's query syntax to filter and find different data aspects and objects.
18516bb1-f465-480c-b84d-7fd5f71fe46b.name: BigID Data Management 1 Module

0e122b77-7cd4-4a26-aa3e-b1dbb1e24f62.description: This module goes deeper into the general modern data privacy aspects, and covers current privacy regulations around the globe and privacy-by-design.
0e122b77-7cd4-4a26-aa3e-b1dbb1e24f62.name: BigID Professional Modern Data Privacy 2 Module

4fea3185-ca9e-4b9c-9d15-fd8ba1eec2af.description: Goes deeper into BigID's data governance and perspective app portfolio, which includes the Metadata Exchange app for Tableau, the Data Quality app, the Data Retention app and the Data Stewardship app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
4fea3185-ca9e-4b9c-9d15-fd8ba1eec2af.name: BigID Master Governance BizUser Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a BigID Master Governance BizUser course

8a54a028-cc9f-4547-bd3d-459de428b652.description: Go deeper into BigID's data security and protection app portfolio, which includes the Data Remediation app, the File Labeling app, and the Access Intelligence app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
8a54a028-cc9f-4547-bd3d-459de428b652.name: BigID Master Security BizUser Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a Master Security BizUser course

d7918bbf-4b86-457c-a9be-e0d2852a6ada.description: This certification confirms master-level proficiency in BigID's data governance and perspective app portfolio, which includes the Data Quality app, the Data Retention app, and the Data Stewardship app. The certification exam focuses on theoretical and practical knowledge of BigID governance apps, usage scenarios, and advanced governance use cases.
d7918bbf-4b86-457c-a9be-e0d2852a6ada.name: Certified BigID Master Governance BizUser

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a Certified BigID Master Governance BizUser certification exam

7ee38ba7-9e1c-47de-9a19-5d18f9f70373.description: Earners of the BigID Associate AppDev 1 badge have successfully completed the BigID Associate AppDev 1 course focused on creating and maintaining custom BigID apps, with emphasis on apps featuring backend logic without a UI. Badge recipients are well-versed in the BigID app framework, relevant concepts and technologies, the app development lifecycle, app deployment, and best practices.
7ee38ba7-9e1c-47de-9a19-5d18f9f70373.name: BigID Associate AppDev 1 Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a BigID Associate AppDev 1 course

268a2c1c-d8ed-4155-a33c-7c889a9dd8cf.description: This module provides a general introduction to data classification techniques. At a high level, it covers the evolution of classification technology, different methods of data classification including regular expressions, NLP and deep learning, and application of classification to structured, unstructured and big data.
268a2c1c-d8ed-4155-a33c-7c889a9dd8cf.name: BigID Professional Data Classification 1 Module

438f46d8-2aa3-42bd-b241-23506158964a.description: This certification confirms master-level proficiency in BigID's data security and protection app portfolio, which includes the Data Remediation app, the File Labeling app, and the Access Intelligence app. The certification exam focuses on theoretical and practical knowledge of BigID security apps, usage scenarios, and advanced security use cases.
438f46d8-2aa3-42bd-b241-23506158964a.name: Certified BigID Master Security BizUser

badge_template_activities.title: Pass a Certified BigID Master Security BizUser certification exam

3c3b8e9d-ba81-4d08-bfc6-88e1acf2fb8d.description: Get to know BigID! Explore Data Discovery, Privacy, Security, and Governance fundamentals and discover BigID's core capabilities through demos and theory.
3c3b8e9d-ba81-4d08-bfc6-88e1acf2fb8d.name: BigID BizUser Essentials 1 Module

fdf240fe-b9de-41f4-859a-721852cc5a8c.description: Earners of the BigID ConnectorDev Pro Course badge have successfully completed the BigID ConnectorDev Pro training focusing on creating and maintaining custom BigID data source connectors leveraging REST API. Badge recipients have hands-on experience with the connector REST API framework and core API endpoints, the connector development lifecycle and deployment, and best practices.
fdf240fe-b9de-41f4-859a-721852cc5a8c.name: BigID ConnectorDev Pro Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a BigID ConnectorDev Pro Course

c0365aa1-177b-49d5-8b05-d723eb3775cc.description: This module provides a deeper hands-on learning experience focusing on BigID's discovery foundation, the 4 C's and related core discovery features . The exercises include a variety of business scenarios and tasks relevant for data professionals in different roles.
c0365aa1-177b-49d5-8b05-d723eb3775cc.name: BigID Discovery Foundation 2 Module

f30b59cb-971a-48b3-bffd-77bdeab77b79.description: This instructor-led lab provides a general introduction to deploying the BigID platform, and runs through an actual installation of a BigID platform from scratch, applying a license, and starting and stopping the platform.
f30b59cb-971a-48b3-bffd-77bdeab77b79.name: BigID Platform Deployment 1 Lab

28996841-03b1-41dc-a335-b75435161ec8.description: Earners of the BigID Associate ConnectorDev 1 badge have successfully completed the BigID Associate ConnectorDev 1 course focusing on creating and maintaining custom BigID data source connectors for structured data sources leveraging REST API. Badge recipients have hands-on experience with the connector REST API framework and core structured API endpoints, the connector development lifecycle and deployment, and best practices.
28996841-03b1-41dc-a335-b75435161ec8.name: BigID Associate ConnectorDev 1 Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a BigID Associate ConnectorDev 1 course

05892de2-3229-4adf-9bc0-fb785835f17b.description: This module introduces some core BigID apps: consent governance, data rights fulfillment, privacy portal, data processing, and access intelligence. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
05892de2-3229-4adf-9bc0-fb785835f17b.name: BigID Business Applications 1 Module

964dfb16-402e-401d-87ba-21f85ff32bf7.description: Designed for data professionals looking to broaden and deepen their domain expertise and industry knowledge, this module introduces general data governance principles and concepts with focus on current trends and best practices. After providing an introduction to the data governance domain, this module goes deeper into modern data stewardship, glossary, rules, cataloging and actions.
964dfb16-402e-401d-87ba-21f85ff32bf7.name: BigID Professional Modern Data Governance 1 Module

9046eed2-22da-4e61-b03d-8f31cde33a4c.description: This module goes deeper into data management within the BigID platform, and provides more exercises and theory on policies and risk, and on the BigID business glossary, tags, and saved queries.
9046eed2-22da-4e61-b03d-8f31cde33a4c.name: BigID Data Management 2 Module

977272bb-2ee4-4dd6-bccb-054ed24b055b.description: Earners of the BigID AppDev Pro Course badge have successfully completed the BigID AppDev Pro training focusing on creating and maintaining custom BigID apps, with emphasis on apps featuring an interactive UI and backend logic. Badge recipients have hands-on experience with the BigID app framework, relevant concepts and technologies, the app development lifecycle, frontend-to-backend communications, UX considerations, custom app deployment, and best practices.
977272bb-2ee4-4dd6-bccb-054ed24b055b.name: BigID AppDev Pro Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a BigID AppDev Pro Course

cce9b0a1-22f1-47ff-97de-96d5588c119e.description: This module introduces the basics on data scanning in BigID. Topics covered include the setup and management of data sources, a high-level coverage of data source credential management, setup and considerations of correlation sets, enabling classification, running basic scans using scan profiles, and the scan results details screen.
cce9b0a1-22f1-47ff-97de-96d5588c119e.name: BigID Data Scanning 1 Module

5cf5479a-2fec-4444-a15b-0e3dd03dca26.description: This module provides a general introduction to deploying the BigID platform, and covers a variety of deployment aspects including planning the deployment, the platform installation and upgrade process, and general deployment considerations.
5cf5479a-2fec-4444-a15b-0e3dd03dca26.name: BigID Platform Deployment 1 Module

848c19a7-972d-407a-aea2-c34934eb58e4.description: This module goes deeper into data classification techniques, and covers NLP, NER and deeper learning in more detail. The module also touches on what methods apply to what data, the impact of spoken language, and the impact of structured vs unstructured data.
848c19a7-972d-407a-aea2-c34934eb58e4.name: BigID Professional Data Classification 2 Module

0fbe56e2-fa36-4f67-a450-28103973f348.description: This module specifically focuses on the RoPA Mapping app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
0fbe56e2-fa36-4f67-a450-28103973f348.name: RoPA Mapping App 1 Module

3bc1c8e7-1192-43d3-a672-6a6dba8bcc61.description: This general privacy-related module focuses on BigID's approach to helping organizations meet the data rights fulfillment requirements imposed by data regulations around the globe. The module starts with high-level introduction to the data subject access request and its challenges, and proceeds to deeper coverage of the BigID data rights fulfillment app and how it can be used to run access requests and configure different profiles.
3bc1c8e7-1192-43d3-a672-6a6dba8bcc61.name: BigID Professional Data Rights Fulfillment 1 Module

aac4eb32-5b3a-40ef-a0e1-1b0ed584be45.description: his module specifically focuses on the Data Rights Fulfillment app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
aac4eb32-5b3a-40ef-a0e1-1b0ed584be45.name: Data Rights Fulfillment App 1 Module

7b01ad2d-0bd0-49f9-8361-6ba98d205d1f.description: This module specifically focuses on the Privacy Portal app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
7b01ad2d-0bd0-49f9-8361-6ba98d205d1f.name: Privacy Portal App 1 Module

12020076-6b17-463f-843a-9f20890792e2.description: This instructor-led lab goes deeper into more advanced BigID installation and upgrade scenarios, gotchas and best practices, and performing various docker tasks.
12020076-6b17-463f-843a-9f20890792e2.name: BigID Platform Deployment 2 Lab

c55b1da9-aad9-4dc7-8e3b-901fc005c1b7.description: This module specifically focuses on the Data Deletion app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
c55b1da9-aad9-4dc7-8e3b-901fc005c1b7.name: Data Deletion App 1 Module

8cd9f09f-e778-4056-952b-4c9c60d31115.description: This module specifically focuses on the Data Retention app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
8cd9f09f-e778-4056-952b-4c9c60d31115.name: Data Retention App 1 Module

a2f2b05b-7107-4383-8e55-2be3a11cb91c.description: This module specifically focuses on the Privacy Impact Assessment app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
a2f2b05b-7107-4383-8e55-2be3a11cb91c.name: Privacy Impact Assessment App 1 Module

584d8f03-843d-4cad-877b-df37d5209b53.description: This module introduces the BigID API, focusing on the initial authentication steps and some simple API calls to demonstrate the process and capabilities. The module includes a short theory module followed by a few hands-on exercises to let learners try out the API flow using their own calls.
584d8f03-843d-4cad-877b-df37d5209b53.name: BigID Platform Integrations 1 Module

a2dedd37-b831-4909-9f6b-1b54a675b8d8.description: This general privacy-related module is focused on consent governance using the BigID platform and the dedicated consent governance app. The module introduces the high-level consent challenges and BigID capabilities, and proceeds to deeper coverage of the app's screens and process flow.
a2dedd37-b831-4909-9f6b-1b54a675b8d8.name: BigID Professional Consent Governance 1 Module

080464fd-a716-491e-b1f1-2aa63173440c.description: This general privacy-related module is focused on an automated approach to managing data rights for consumers using BigID's privacy portal. The module presents the general design concepts, screens and process flow of the privacy portal, and shows how it can be used to help consumers get a copy of the data or place data deletion requests.
080464fd-a716-491e-b1f1-2aa63173440c.name: BigID Professional Consumer Data Rights Management 1 Module

1a5284c2-d81d-4346-bbc2-ee9e595e7975.description: This instructor-led lab introduces the BigID API, focusing on the initial authentication steps and some simple API calls to demonstrate the process and capabilities. The lab includes a short theory refresher followed by a few hands-on exercises to let learners try out the API flow using their own calls.
1a5284c2-d81d-4346-bbc2-ee9e595e7975.name: BigID Platform Integrations 1 Lab

a9b38fd7-9e72-434a-a20e-e75503361489.description: This module specifically focuses on the Consent Governance app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
a9b38fd7-9e72-434a-a20e-e75503361489.name: Consent Governance App 1 Module

9ffd2e29-042e-483b-be85-3d589d3c460c.description: BigID Ambassadors are selected members of the BigID community who demonstrate knowledge, involvement, and passion. As the title suggests, BigID Ambassadors are BigID customers and partners who are passionate about BigID and help promote our value and solution portfolio in various forums and channels. BigID Ambassadors have credible familiarity with the business and/or technical aspects of the BigID platform, and are highly involved in our community.
9ffd2e29-042e-483b-be85-3d589d3c460c.name: BigID Ambassador

badge_template_activities.title: Please contact community@bigid.com in case you would like to join the Bigid ambassador program.

3d207fe2-0def-45d9-8f43-14df0edfe756.description: Goes deeper into BigID's data privacy app portfolio, which includes the RoPA app, the PIA app and the Data Deletion app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
3d207fe2-0def-45d9-8f43-14df0edfe756.name: BigID Data Classification 1 Lab

92162b56-8cde-493c-853c-6e08f107b35f.description: This module is focused on data classification in BigID, and includes theory and practice on data and metadata classifiers, the regular expression basic syntax, document classifiers, and advanced classifiers.
92162b56-8cde-493c-853c-6e08f107b35f.name: BigID Data Classification 1 Module

17a7055c-73ae-4e3b-91ac-d04fa2d2fe5d.description: This module provides a deeper perspective and hands-on practice for the BigID discovery foundation and the 4 C's. We cover the catalog, classification, cluster analysis and correlation capabilities, measuring risk and applying policies. We also touch on data sources, correlation sets and scanning.
17a7055c-73ae-4e3b-91ac-d04fa2d2fe5d.name: BigID Discovery Foundation 1 Module

f076ab97-3ac7-4f31-9bf1-514670ac0a9e.description: This module is heavily based on practical work, and goes deeper into advanced data source configuration and management, data source best practices, advanced correlation sets, analysis and refinement of scan results, and identifying false positives and negatives.
f076ab97-3ac7-4f31-9bf1-514670ac0a9e.name: BigID Data Scanning 2 Module

94fc7a69-ac55-40ce-83f8-b97de3e054f3.description: This module covers a variety of core platform setup tasks usually performed after installation, including email integration, IDP integration for single-sign-on, setting up users and roles, configuring services, and setting up SSL certificates.
94fc7a69-ac55-40ce-83f8-b97de3e054f3.name: BigID Platform Setup 1 Module

9becfcd3-4daf-481d-8740-b217193de80d.description: This module specifically focuses on the Data Processing and Sharing app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
9becfcd3-4daf-481d-8740-b217193de80d.name: Data Processing and Sharing App 1 Module

aeeabe26-cfb4-44cb-91bb-54015be19ea9.description: This module specifically focuses on the Remediation app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
aeeabe26-cfb4-44cb-91bb-54015be19ea9.name: Remediation App 1 Module

311804d5-4338-432e-9a60-6d75909b444a.description: This module focuses on general maintenance of the BigID platform, and includes support topics like examining the system health, log review, and general approach to troubleshooting. We also briefly mention other maintenance tasks like backups.
311804d5-4338-432e-9a60-6d75909b444a.name: BigID Platform Maintenance 1 Module

62ebdafb-513c-4d58-b84d-ac82755fe451.description: This module specifically focuses on the Data Quality app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
62ebdafb-513c-4d58-b84d-ac82755fe451.name: Data Quality App 1 Module

5241ebd1-42ea-4da0-83fe-4a9295331624.description: This module specifically focuses on the Risk Configuration app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
5241ebd1-42ea-4da0-83fe-4a9295331624.name: Risk Configuration App 1 Module

56d2d676-4245-4940-8e90-00c5bab1434e.description: This module specifically focuses on the Access Intelligence app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
56d2d676-4245-4940-8e90-00c5bab1434e.name: Access Intelligence App 1 Module

af457cb3-c848-4923-9139-9270d295ac69.description: This module specifically focuses on the Data Stewardship app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
af457cb3-c848-4923-9139-9270d295ac69.name: Data Stewardship App 1 Module

454315b6-03bb-4017-a635-567dcc59ffb9.description: This self-paced module covers BigID's metadata exchange applications and integrations with enterprise and data management solutions like ServiceNow, Collibra, EDC, Alation and Tableau. Leveraging these high-value integrations, BigID's discovery-in-depth and personal data inventory are used to enrich those solutions with deeper data insights, enhance their security, privacy and perspective data views, and gain a more complete perspective of the enterprise data environment.
454315b6-03bb-4017-a635-567dcc59ffb9.name: BigID Application Integrations 1 Module

314bd493-7b6a-4060-8ed0-bf56211781f2.description: This instructor-led lab goes deeper into advanced data source configuration and management, data source best practices, advanced correlation sets, analysis and refinement of scan results, and identifying false positives and negatives.
314bd493-7b6a-4060-8ed0-bf56211781f2.name: BigID Data Scanning 2 Lab

3b86a676-4286-4582-9e0c-aebad336047e.description: This module goes deeper into platform maintenance tasks, and includes theory and practice on a variety of maintenance topics including data cleanup, advanced troubleshooting practice, and backing up the platform database.
3b86a676-4286-4582-9e0c-aebad336047e.name: BigID Platform Maintenance 2 Module

aa1cd0e3-0f7c-4295-9424-e004903e73b8.description: This module covers a variety of core platform setup tasks usually performed after installation, including email integration, IDP integration for single-sign-on, setting up users and roles, configuring services, and setting up SSL certificates.
aa1cd0e3-0f7c-4295-9424-e004903e73b8.name: BigID Platform Setup 2 Module

58d76c79-3e49-4599-96ae-a4bad4630a47.description: This hands-on module introduces the creation of custom BigID apps, with emphasis on apps featuring backend logic without a UI. Module topics and exercises include the BigID app framework, the app development and deployment lifecycle, developing an actual simple app, and best practices.
58d76c79-3e49-4599-96ae-a4bad4630a47.name: BigID Utility App Development 1 Module

215a6240-c96c-472d-adbf-1e9159817c1b.description: This module specifically focuses on the Breach Response app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
215a6240-c96c-472d-adbf-1e9159817c1b.name: Breach Response App 1 Module

33ada908-6436-4310-8d3a-b27a42989351.description: Earners of the BigID Associate AppDev 2 badge have successfully completed the BigID Associate AppDev 2 course focused on creating and maintaining custom BigID apps, with emphasis on apps featuring an interactive UI. Badge recipients have practical skills and knowledge of the BigID app framework, relevant concepts and technologies, frontend-to-backend communications, UX considerations, and best practices.
33ada908-6436-4310-8d3a-b27a42989351.name: BigID Associate AppDev 2 Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a BigID Associate AppDev 2 course

b6687f76-1d62-47b6-987f-7941ed2ec167.description: Earners of the BigID Associate ConnectorDev 2 badge have successfully completed the BigID Associate ConnectorDev 2 course focusing on creating and maintaining custom BigID data source connectors for unstructured data sources leveraging REST API. Badge recipients have hands-on experience with the connector REST API framework and core structured API endpoints, the connector development lifecycle and deployment, and best practices.
b6687f76-1d62-47b6-987f-7941ed2ec167.name: BigID Associate ConnectorDev 2 Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a BigID Associate ConnectorDev 2 course

0b8a47c6-e4f1-4791-bbe6-5065f1e725a9.description: Earners of the BigID Master ConnectorDev 1 badge have successfully completed the BigID Master ConnectorDev 1 course focusing on connector authentication technologies and techniques. Badge recipients are versed in real-world aspects and best practices for implementing authentication approaches with data sources.
0b8a47c6-e4f1-4791-bbe6-5065f1e725a9.name: BigID Master ConnectorDev 1 Course

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a BigID Master ConnectorDev 1 Course

8c9457d4-beb6-451a-9813-10ca89676323.description: This hands-on module goes deeper into the the BigID API, and also presents general integration of BigID with BI tools like Tableau. The module flow includes significant exercises on advanced API calls, exception handling and real-world considerations.
8c9457d4-beb6-451a-9813-10ca89676323.name: BigID Platform Integrations 2 Module

1ae839fb-dc91-4e73-8eea-d1a85e5ff099.description: This interactive module offers self-paced, guided, hands-on training tours within the BigID platform that are specifically designed for data governance professionals. For this module, each learner is assigned a fully-functional BigID system with demo data for 24 hours. Learners are welcome to run through any available tour and try out different data governance capabilities like the BigID catalog, the data quality app and the data stewardship app.
1ae839fb-dc91-4e73-8eea-d1a85e5ff099.name: BigID Tour for Data Pros 1 Module

3d1729a5-7aac-4ab9-a563-c858b62730f4.description: This module is designed for people who use BigID to derive business value for data privacy, protection, and perspective. It starts with an introduction to the Data Intelligence Platform and BigID applications, continues with data discovery applications (such as catalog, correlation, classification, and cluster analysis), then concludes with business applications for specific use cases.
3d1729a5-7aac-4ab9-a563-c858b62730f4.name: BigID Business Applications 0 Module

102807b7-6e21-4f16-9a19-297dd7faf4d9.description: This module focuses on the challenges that global companies face around data governance, privacy and security, and BigID's value in helping meet those challenges. The module presents the BigID discovery foundation and the 4 C's, BigID core business apps, and an introduction to the BigID platform user interface.
102807b7-6e21-4f16-9a19-297dd7faf4d9.name: BigID Business Value 1 Module

alignments.name: BigID Business Value 1
alignments.description: This module focuses on the challenges that global companies face around data governance, privacy and security, and BigID's value in helping meet those challenges. The module presents the BigID discovery foundation and the 4 C's, BigID core business apps, and an introduction to the BigID platform user interface.

cbb58461-035e-4041-ad61-731543fc2915.description: Designed for BigID users who manage BigID's data discovery operations, this course covers data source and correlation set declaration, scan profile configuration, and data scan execution. It also explores scan result refinement through actions that can enhance quality of data in the catalog that informs business applications.
cbb58461-035e-4041-ad61-731543fc2915.name: BigID Data Discovery 0 Module

0416351c-aa92-4366-991c-93b8230c2c09.description: This hands-on module focuses on building custom BigID apps that feature an interactive UI. The module mostly consists of practical exercises that go deeper into the BigID app framework, relevant concepts and technologies, frontend-to-backend communications, UX considerations and best practices.
0416351c-aa92-4366-991c-93b8230c2c09.name: BigID Interactive App Development 1 Module

70a4d840-b4ca-49e0-aa5b-4f65260247e0.description: This high-level module is designed for people who manage BigID projects and deployments. It starts with modern data challenges and how BigID addresses them, and a general description of the BigID data intelligence platform, architecture, and data discovery. It then explores the BigID UI and applications that provide business value, and continues to platform deployment and administration essentials to help with project planning and minimize time-to-value.
70a4d840-b4ca-49e0-aa5b-4f65260247e0.name: BigID Overview for Managers Module

d8ca392d-2ec6-4089-9075-7ec963d5612e.description: This hands-on module is based on practical exercises including an actual installation of a BigID platform from scratch, applying a license, starting and stopping the platform, and performing various docker tasks.
d8ca392d-2ec6-4089-9075-7ec963d5612e.name: BigID Platform Deployment 2 Module

af87d610-5c2a-4d43-8306-eb50980f82f8.name: BigID Professional BigID RoPA Management 1 Module

69ac7b58-47ea-4c96-addf-4642e3c3fa5e.description: Earners of the BigExchange Community Contributor badge are active community members who accumulated at least 500 engagement points. Engagement points are granted based on various member activities such as forum posts and replies, content contribution, blog posts, etc.
69ac7b58-47ea-4c96-addf-4642e3c3fa5e.name: Community Contributor

badge_template_activities.title: Add a profile picture, be active in the forum, suggest ideas on the ideation page, post an article.

77523145-612e-44ed-ab34-0ca3413dbdd6.description: Earners of the BigExchange Community Super Contributor badge are active community members who accumulated at least 1000 engagement points. Engagement points are granted based on various member activities such as forum posts and replies, content contributions, blog posts, etc.
77523145-612e-44ed-ab34-0ca3413dbdd6.name: Community Super Contributor

badge_template_activities.title: Be very active in the forum, suggest ideas on the ideation page, post an article, contribute applications.

30b11e28-0db8-4c91-96d4-3b27a7073822.description: This module specifically focuses on the File Labeling app. Learners are introduced to app screens, use cases and business value, and run through practical exercises.
30b11e28-0db8-4c91-96d4-3b27a7073822.name: File Labeling App 1 Module

665fdf1b-43fb-4a95-bf21-5727e5ff7c3c.description: This qualification exam ensures mastery of implementing data rights fulfillment, consumer data rights management, consent governance and RoPA management, as implemented within the BigID platform. Learners are tested on their understanding of general design concepts, screens, and process flow of the relevant privacy requirements and apps, and on their knowledge of BigID's approach to helping organizations meet modern data rights requirements around the globe.
665fdf1b-43fb-4a95-bf21-5727e5ff7c3c.name: Qualified Master Data Privacy Pro
